Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

What do you think of the socio-economic 
envirronment situation in Argentina and 
what should they do about it? 

  o What the fuck are you talking bout, Azure? 
  o Poor little kids, no food, no home, no gameboys... 
  o They should become communists 
  o They'll blame it all on the US, like everybody else, and they'd be right! 
  o Where's Argentina? Is it a new planet? 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
